name: Datacloud

methods.name: getCompaniesFromOrder
methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.DatacloudCompanies getCompaniesFromOrder(String orderId, String pageSize, String page)
methods.description: Get a list of purchased company records for an order.

params.name: pageSize
params.description: ID of an order. Number of the page that you want returned. Number of companies to show on a page. The default pageSize is 25.

params.name: companyId
params.description: ID of a company in the Data.com database.

params.name: contactId
params.description: ID of a contact in the Data.com database.

methods.signature: public static ConnectApi.DatacloudContacts getContactsFromOrder(String orderId, String page, String pageSize)
methods.description: Get a list of purchased contacts for an order.

params.name: pageSize
params.description: ID of an order. Number of the page that you want returned. Number of contacts to show on a page. The default pageSize is 25.

methods.description: Get purchase usage information for a user.
